text:
@DrTedros @70mbare @WHO During his press conference on Coronavirus,Trump said it’s like the flu and that people should just follow the hygiene protocols they follow for the flu and not one reporter asked him the obvious follow-up question - 
If that’s true, why did China quarantine millions of people?

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
